abstract: major spoilers revealed in leaked lego sets for avengers : infinity war .
article: over the weekend , shots of lego sets for avengers : infinity war leaked online . in them , the avengers ' new wardrobe lay on display ; their wardrobe consisting of new costumes and weaponry . when it comes to marvel movies , lego has become known for `` accidentally '' letting out toy designs which reveal potential spoilers . the first time lego came under fire for doing so was before the release of captain america : civil war . the toy sets ' early release wound up spoiling the big reveal of ant-man transforming into giant-man during the major airport scene , and that 's just one example .

various other marvel movies have seen minor plot details spoiled as well , and now it appears as if avengers : infinity war will too . several images of the toy sets leaked online , giving way to plot points not yet known . spoilers ahead ... the images in question were posted to imgur , providing us with a glimpse at earth 's mightiest in some new getups , as well as packing some new weaponry . you can check them out below . in the first slide , a toy set for doctor strange 's sanctum santorum is displayed .

the set comes with doctor strange , an unrecognizable stone character who resembles korg , a small figure that could be meik , iron man , and spider-man . most would question korg and meik 's presence at the sanctum but they 're not the most noteworthy out of the bunch . it 's spider-man who we should be paying attention to . the reason is his new costume . more from hidden remote exclusive : discovery takes viewers to the races in street outlaws : memphis24m ago how to watch the gifted season 1 finale online1 h ago how to watch the bachelor season 22 , episode 3 online2h ago bob 's burgers : v for valentine-detta is sweet and salty11h ago netflix : with aziz ansari allegation , will netflix pull master of none ?

14h ago the spider-man figurine in question is wearing an all red suit with large appendages sticking out of his back . anyone familiar with this character design will recognize it as the iron spider armor , thus confirming its introduction in avengers : infinity war . many hoped the iron spider suit would show up in spider-man : homecoming but that did n't come to pass . fortunately , peter parker will don the armor at some point in infinity war . we do n't yet know when it 'll show up but my guess is that the iron spider armor will be given to parker after his first fight with thanos .

the trailer teased his first confrontation with thanos and it does n't go well . let 's just hope peter parker learns how to use the iron spider armor in time to help his friends save the universe . thor wields the ax , jarnbjorn in ` avengers : infinity war ` the second slide of intrigue shows off the guardians ' new ship , accompanied by rocket , groot , and thor figurines . between those three , the thor toy stands out the most -- mainly because he 's carrying a new weapon , an ax . a tease of thor 's new weapon was shown in concept art for infinity war but there was n't a clear shot of it .

now however , we can confirm that thor will take up the ax , jarnbjorn as his new weapon of choice . watch your favorite shows on fubotv : watch over 67 live sports and entertainment channels with a 7-day free trial ! in the comics , thor takes up jarnbjorn after he 's deemed unworthy to wield the hammer , mjolnir . he actually picked up the weapon to fight apocalypse and kept it by his side for some time after . thor eventually gained the right to carry mjolnir again but used jarnbjorn on various other occasions .

furthermore , the thor figurine carrying jarnbjorn likely means he 's given up mjolnir completely . and it does n't look like there 's any way for him to recover his signature hammer -- that is unless he goes back in time to change history . a fight for the infinity gauntlet will take place in ` avengers : infinity war ` thirdly , a slide consisting of thanos , iron man , gamora , and peter quill hint at quite an interesting confrontation . a fight between these two forces was glimpsed briefly in the avengers : infinity war trailer but now we may know exactly why they 're fighting -- for the infinity gauntlet .

in the middle of this toy set , the infinity gauntlet remains propped up on a stand of some kind . it appears to be waiting for a victor to pick it up . could this all be due to someone wrestling the gauntlet from thanos ? the scene does give me the impression that thanos and iron man are racing towards it , so there 's a good chance an avenger will wield the infinity gauntlet before the conclusion of avengers : infinity war . the infinity gauntlet holds additional significance because of the stone fitted within , the reality stone .

while the infinity war trailer has shown us the gauntlet fitted with the space and power stones , the reality stone will come into play at some point . when it does , the entire marvel universe could get a massive revamp . images from avengers 4 do seem to hint at the mcu receiving a reboot of sorts . therefore , an avenger using the reality stone to change the universe 's fate is plausible . my money is on iron man using his new bleeding edge armor to race to the gauntlet before thanos can reach it .

although , that may be dependent on someone cutting off thanos ' entire hand , perhaps gamora . captain steve rogers packing some new heat in ` avengers : infinity war ` the final slide of interests depicts a steve rogers toy in his semi-new costume . it shares similarities with his civil war suit but with black tones thrown in . he 's also carrying some new weapons , two blasters to be precise . the lego image is too small to determine any significant details but rogers has clearly put aside his shield for more practical weaponry , and for good reason .

subscribe to hulu now : live + streaming . it 's tv come true . the set piece also includes a large alien ship that seems to be the outriders ' mode of transportation . rogers will have help from black widow to fight them but he 's going to have to be on the offensive to win this match-up . some vibranium blasters will help him with that . next : every avenger we know survives avengers : infinity war do these lego sets offer any other hidden details ? apart from the noteworthy mentions listed above , these new lego sets may hold even more clues towards the plot of avengers : infinity war .

while they may not seem apparent at the time , there 's likely more hidden gems within . so if we missed something , leave us a note in the comments section below . avengers : infinity war opens in theaters on may 4 , 2018 . avengers 4 premieres may 3 , 2019 . over the weekend , shots of lego sets for avengers : infinity war leaked online . in them , the avengers ' new wardrobe lay on display ; their wardrobe consisting of new costumes and weaponry . when it comes to marvel movies , lego has become known for `` accidentally '' letting out toy designs ...
